Developed by Stas Melnikov

Animation

Animsition

A simple and easy jQuery plugin for css animated page transitions.

http://git.blivesta.com/animsition/

https://github.com/blivesta/animsition

jQuery Transit

jQuery Transit is a plugin for to help you do CSS transformations and transitions in jQuery.

http://ricostacruz.com/jquery.transit/

https://github.com/rstacruz/jquery.transit

Graphics

Chartist.js

Chartist's goal is to provide a simple, lightweight and unintrusive library to responsively craft charts on your website. It's important to understand that one of the main intentions of Chartist.js is to rely on standards rather than providing it's own solution to a problem which is already solved by those standards.

http://gionkunz.github.io/chartist-js/

https://github.com/gionkunz/chartist-js

dc.js

Dimensional charting built to work natively with crossfilter rendered using d3.js. Check out the example page with a quick five minutes how to guide. For a detailed API reference and more please visit the Wiki.

https://github.com/dc-js/dc.js

vis.js

Vis.js is a dynamic, browser based visualization library. The library is designed to be easy to use, handle large amounts of dynamic data, and enable manipulation of the data.

https://github.com/almende/vis

Highcharts JS

Highcharts JS is a JavaScript charting library based on SVG and VML rendering.

http://www.highcharts.com/

https://github.com/highslide-software/highcharts.com

jsPlumb

jsPlumb provides a means for a developer to visually connect elements on their web pages. It uses SVG or Canvas in modern browsers, and VML on IE 8 and below.

https://jsplumbtoolkit.com/demo/flowchart/dom.html

https://github.com/sporritt/jsplumb/

Images

Image Cropper

A simple jQuery image cropping plugin.

http://fengyuanchen.github.io/cropper/

https://github.com/fengyuanchen/cropper

Image Blur Plugin

Ultra light cross browser image blurring plugin for jQuery

http://msurguy.github.io/background-blur/

https://github.com/msurguy/background-blur

About Zoom

A small jQuery plugin for zooming images on mouseover or mousedown. See the project page for documentation and a demonstration.

http://www.jacklmoore.com/zoom/

https://github.com/jackmoore/zoom

Sliders

Vegas â€“ Backgrounds and Slideshows

Vegas is a jQuery/Zepto plugin to add beautiful backgrounds and Slideshows to DOM elements.

http://vegas.jaysalvat.com/

https://github.com/jaysalvat/vegas

JQuery lightSlider

JQuery lightSlider is a lightweight responsive Content slider with carousel thumbnails navigation

http://sachinchoolur.github.io/lightslider/

https://github.com/sachinchoolur/lightslider/

Simple Image Slider

A simple jquery plugin for creating image comparison sliders

http://kavyasukumar.com/apps/imgSlider/

https://github.com/kavyasukumar/imgSlider

\

Lightboxs

lightGallery

A customizable, modular, responsive, lightbox gallery plugin for jQuery.

http://sachinchoolur.github.io/lightGallery/

https://github.com/sachinchoolur/lightGallery

Swipebox

A touchable jQuery lightbox.

https://brutaldesign.github.io/swipebox/

https://github.com/brutaldesign/swipebox

Lightbox

Lightbox is small javascript library used to overlay images on top of the current page. It's a snap to setup and works on all modern browsers.

http://lokeshdhakar.com/projects/lightbox2/

https://github.com/lokesh/lightbox2

Colorbox

A customizable lightbox plugin for jQuery.

http://www.jacklmoore.com/colorbox/

https://github.com/jackmoore/colorbox

Viewer

A simple jQuery image viewing plugin.

http://fengyuanchen.github.io/viewer/

https://github.com/fengyuanchen/viewer

Modal

Avgrund

Avgrund is a jQuery plugin for your modal boxes and popups. It uses new concept showing depth between popup and page.It works in all modern browsers and gracefully degrade in those that do not support CSS transitions and transformations.

http://labs.voronianski.com/jquery.avgrund.js/

https://github.com/voronianski/jquery.avgrund.js

plainModal

The simple jQuery Plugin for fully customizable modal windows. plainModal has basic functions only, and it does not style. It has no image files and no CSS files. Just one small file.

http://anseki.github.io/jquery-plainmodal/

https://github.com/anseki/jquery-plainmodal

Others

PriorityNavigation.js

PriorityNav is a lightweight pure javascript plugin that will move your menu items if they don't fit its parent.

http://gijsroge.github.io/priority-nav.js/

https://github.com/gijsroge/priority-navigation

JQUERY.PEP.JS

Pep, a lightweight plugin for kinetic drag on mobile/desktop.

http://pep.briangonzalez.org/

https://github.com/briangonzalez/jquery.pep.js

jQuery PicTip

jQuery PicTip is a plugin that adds handy tooltips to your images, slideshows, sliders and more.

http://dfernandeza.github.io/pictip/

https://github.com/dfernandeza/pictip

TinyMCE

TinyMCE is a platform independent web based Javascript HTML WYSIWYG editor control released as Open Source under LGPL.

https://www.tinymce.com/

https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce

Echo.js

Echo is a standalone JavaScript lazy-loading image micro-library. Echo is fast, 2KB, and uses HTML5 data-* attributes for simple. Check out a demo. Echo works in IE8+.

https://github.com/toddmotto/echo

TreeGrid

Create TreeGrid from HTML table

http://maxazan.github.io/jquery-treegrid/

https://github.com/maxazan/jquery-treegrid

Previewer

A simple jQuery page preview plugin.

https://github.com/fengyuanchen/previewer

http://fengyuanchen.github.io/previewer/

Timepicker for Twitter Bootstrap

A simple timepicker component for Twitter Bootstrap.

http://jdewit.github.io/bootstrap-timepicker/

https://github.com/jdewit/bootstrap-timepicker

jQuery ListNav Plugin

Create a world of alphabetical navigation filters one list at a time!

http://ericsteinborn.com/jquery-listnav/

https://github.com/esteinborn/jquery-listnav

AlloyUI

AlloyUI is a framework built on top of YUI3 (JavaScript) that uses Bootstrap 3 (HTML/CSS) to provide a simple API for building high scalable applications.

http://alloyui.com/

https://github.com/liferay/alloy-ui/

Keyboard

Virtual Keyboard using jQuery UI

http://mottie.github.io/Keyboard/

https://github.com/Mottie/Keyboard

Bootstrap Dual Listbox

Bootstrap Dual Listbox is a responsive dual listbox widget optimized for Twitter Bootstrap. It works on all modern browsers and on touch devices.

http://www.virtuosoft.eu/code/bootstrap-duallistbox/

https://github.com/istvan-ujjmeszaros/bootstrap-duallistbox
